project.name: GWTCX GAE dependencies POM
project.description:
Aggregate POM used to simplify GAE dependency retrieval.
Related dependencies are grouped together into a POM then added as a dependency to a project as needed. This approach works for "compile" scoped dependencies, however, it fails for "provided" scoped dependencies because transitive dependencies are omitted.
See: http://maven.apache.org/guides/introduction/introduction-to-dependency-mechanism.html
